channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Hole in road, 29th June
item.description:
About 2 inches deep

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 56 Hanover Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Broken glass in the park next to Hatherley library by the big play area, 29th June
item.description:

item.title: Bathtub and washing machine, 28th June

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 53 Granville Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Road surface has reached end of life and needs renewing, 28th June
item.description:
The concrete surface of Reddings Road has been deteriorating for many years with the sections between each concrete "slab" getting larger and making it increasingly dangerous to cycle on this busy through road. I believe the road has not been resurfaced since the prefabs were put up just after WW2.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 43 Reddings Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road surface is broken up, 28th June
item.description:
The surface of this mini-roundabout is so badly potholed that it is dangerous to cycle over.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Enstone House The Reddings, The Reddings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Growth round bole of tree, 27th June
item.description:
The foliage round the bottom of this tree on Lansdown Road is obscuring the view of cars on the inside lane coming past the Texaco filling station and into town. If it could be cut back I believe the problem will be sorted and less dangerous for people trying to cross the road from the Lansdown pub side. Many thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 27 Lansdown Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poor road surface in Bournside Road, 27th June
item.description:
A number of small deep holes are causing problems, particularly for cyclists, in the road outside number 1 Bournside Road. See photos.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Croft Bournside Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 39 Golden Vale, Churchdown

item.title: Huge Pothole Previously reported - NOTHING Done!, 26th June
item.description:
The location is Westdown Carpark in the AONB - a well used area for access to Cleeve Common. This Pothole has gotten larger and deeper and vehicles are likely to be damaged sooner or later. Please can it be filled in as soon as possible - there is even some hardcore flytipped in the area that could be used!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Sevenhampton
Report on FixMyStreet
